original_text: Israelite families. We all expect to receive what God has promised to us. That is why we Jews always worship God, in the day and in the night. Like these Jews here, I believe in God's great promise. But that is the reason that they speak against me. For that reason, one day I was travelling to Damascus. The leaders of the priests in Jerusalem had sent me there. They had given me authority to take hold of the believers there.
korean_text: 그 일로 대제사장들의 권한과 위임을 받고 다메섹으로 갔나이다

sentences.original_text: We all expect to receive what God has promised to us.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모두 하나님이 우리에게 약속하신 것을 받기를 기대합니다.

sentences.original_text: That is why we Jews always worship God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리 유대인들은 항상 하나님을 경배합니다.

sentences.original_text: in the day and in the night.
I believe in God's great promise.
But that is the reason that they speak against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것이 그들이 나를 비난하는 이유입니다.

sentences.original_text: For that reason, one day I was travelling to Damascus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 이유로, 어느 날 나는 다마스커스로 여행하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests in Jerusalem had sent me there.
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘의 제사장 지도자들이 나를 그곳으로 보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: They had given me authority to take hold of the believers there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거기 있는 신자들을 붙잡을 권한을 나에게 주었습니다.
